alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 12:31PM EST until February 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam affecting Union and Posey Counties. .Snow and ice melt from last week`s winter storm will cause the Ohio River to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning to a crest of 38.3 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
